code: import axios from"axios";var baseUrl="http://localhost:3001/items";var getAll=function getAll(){return axios.get(baseUrl);};var create=function create(newItem){return axios.post(baseUrl,newItem);};var deleteItem=function deleteItem(id){return axios.delete("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id));};var update=function update(id,changedItem){return axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),changedItem);};export default{getAll:getAll,create:create,deleteItem:deleteItem,update:update};
